Single value

<nouislider [min]="0" [max]="10" [step]="0.05" [(ngModel)]="someValue" (ngModelChange)="onChange($event)"></nouislider>
someValue: {{ someValue | json }}

Single value (in <form>)

<form><nouislider name="form_value" [min]="0" [max]="10" [step]="0.5" [(ngModel)]="someFormValue"></nouislider></form>
someFormValue: {{ someFormValue | json }}

Range

<nouislider [connect]="true" [min]="0" [max]="15" [step]="1" [(ngModel)]="someRange" (ngModelChange)="onChange($event)"></nouislider>
someRange: {{ someRange | json }}

Range with config

someRange2config: any = {
  behaviour: 'drag',
  connect: true,
  margin: 1,
  limit: 5, // NOTE: overwritten by [limit]="10"
  range: {
    min: 0,
    max: 20
  },
  pips: {
    mode: 'steps',
    density: 5
  }
};
<nouislider [config]="someRange2config" [limit]="10" [(ngModel)]="someRange2"></nouislider>
someRange2: {{ someRange2 | json }}
